title.narrative: Programme Thématique d'Appui à la Gouvernance au Mali

description.narrative:
The Good Governance programme has the following core objectives: to fight corruption and organised crime, strengthen the judiciary system, support the participation of civil society and increase the role of the Malian parliament.
The programme consists of the following components: Component A - strengthening of democratic processes through support to the Malian parliament. Activities center on the capacity building of members and parliamentary groups as well as a strengthening of the parliaments administration processes. Gender and women's participation in politics is a key focal area. The project is implemented in cooperation with UNDP, the Malian parliament and the National Democratic Institute (NDI) in Mali. Component B works to consolidate the Malian judiciary system through three core intervention areas: 1) sector reforms in order to improve the efficiency of the judiciary system, in cooperation with the Canadian government, 2) improved access to justice through training of paralegals, in cooperation with the organisation DEMESO and the Danish Institute for Human Rights, 3) fight against organised crime, including drug trafficking, and corruption, in cooperation with the Malian ministry of justice and UNODC.
Component C aims at enhancing the role of civil society in political process and public debates, and the capacity building of civil society organisations. The project is implemented through a multidonor fund in order to pool resources.
The Good Governance programme was revised in 2011. As a result of the political events and conflict that occurred in 2012, a further component was added in 2012 to promote dialogue and reconciliation in Mali. The component consists of two initiatives, 1) a project with the Center for Humanitarian Dialogue to strengthen dialogue and reconciliation at the political level, 2) a project with Interpeace in order to strengthen dialogue and reconciliation at community level.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Co-operation

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

policy-marker.narrative: Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)
